twitter.title: Twitter Stats
twitter.description: A summary of Twitter activity for a campaign.

tweets.title: Tweet Count
tweets.description: The number of tweets including a link to the campaign.

first_tweet.title: First Tweet Timestamp
first_tweet.description: The day and time of the first recorded tweet with a link to the campaign.

last_tweet.title: Last Tweet Timestamp
last_tweet.description: The day and time of the last recorded tweet with a link to the campaign.

retweets.title: Retweet Count
retweets.description: The number of retweets that include a link to the campaign.

statuses.title: Twitter Status
statuses.description: A summary of tweets that include a link to the campaign.

screen_name.title: Screen Name
screen_name.description: The Twitter handle for the author of the tweet.

status_id.title: Status ID
status_id.description: The individual id for the tweet.

is_retweet.title: Is Retweet
is_retweet.description: A 'true' or 'false' status of whether the tweet is a retweet.

clicks.title: Click Summary
clicks.description: A summary of the click-throughs on the campaign's URL.

clicks.title: Clicks
clicks.description: The total number of clicks to the campaign's URL.

first_click.title: First Click
first_click.description: The timestamp for the first click to the URL.

last_click.title: Last Click
last_click.description: The timestamp for the last click to the URL.

locations.title: Click Locations
locations.description: A summary of the top click locations.

country.title: Country
country.description: The two-digit country code for a recorded click.

region.title: Region
region.description: If available, a specific region where the click was recorded.

referrers.title: Referrers
referrers.description: A summary of the top referrers for the campaign.

items.title: Referrer
items.description: A single instance of a campaign referral.

clicks.title: Clicks
clicks.description: The number of clicks a single referrer generated.

first_click.title: First Click
first_click.description: The timestamp for the first click from this referrer.

last_click.title: Last Click
last_click.description: The timestamp for the last click from this referrer.

eepurl.title: Eepurl
eepurl.description: The shortened link used for tracking.

campaign_id.title: Campaign ID
campaign_id.description: The unique id for the campaign.

total_items.title: Item Count
total_items.description: The total number of items matching the query regardless of pagination.

_links.title: Links
_links.description: A list of link types and descriptions for the API schema documents.

items.title: Resource Link
items.description: This object represents a link from the resource where it is found to another resource or action that may be performed.

rel.title: Rel
rel.description: As with an HTML 'rel' attribute, this describes the type of link.

href.title: Href
href.description: This property contains a fully-qualified URL that can be called to retrieve the linked resource or perform the linked action.

method.title: Method
method.description: The HTTP method that should be used when accessing the URL defined in 'href'.

targetSchema.title: Target Schema
targetSchema.description: For GETs, this is a URL representing the schema that the response should conform to.

schema.title: Schema
schema.description: For HTTP methods that can receive bodies (POST and PUT), this is a URL representing the schema that the body should conform to.
